text: @MattHancock Wonderful.  We in the Desolation of the North can listen to horse racing, whilst watching free football, whilst eating meals made on a budget, whilst pulling out our own teeth, whilst not being able to see GP, whilst you allow the 2nd wave of coronavirus without track and trace
